did.unittitle: Borough Hall: Mirror of Change exhibit photograph collection

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The Borough Hall: Mirror of Change exhibit photograph collection contains 47 items dated circa 1982. Images in the collection document artwork in the exhibit curated by Elliot Willensky, then Brooklyn Borough Historian, and held by the Brooklyn Borough President. The collection includes black-and-white prints, color negatives, color transparencies, and black-and-white transparencies. Exhibit items depicted include maps of Brooklyn, aerial views of Brooklyn, architectural drawings of Borough Hall, and various Brooklyn neighborhoods.
